parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Maribyrnong, Victoria, 2007, 2010 and 2013.

ministerial.appointments.title: Ministerial Appointments
ministerial.appointments.para: Parliamentary Secretary for Disabilities and Children's Services from 3.12.07 to 14.9.10.
Parliamentary Secretary for Victorian Bushfire Reconstruction from 25.2.09 to 14.9.10.
Minister for Financial Services and Superannuation from 14.9.10 to 1.7.13.
Minister for Employment and Workplace Relations from 14.12.11 to 1.7.13.
Minister for Workplace Relations from 1.7.13 to 18.9.13.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Leader of the Federal Parliamentary Labor Party from 13.10.13.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Member, ALP State Administrative Committee (Vic) from 1989.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Director, Australian Super (formerly Superannuation Trust Australia) 1998-2007.

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: north-western Melbourne; it includes the suburbs of Aberfeldie, Airport West, Avondale Heights, Braybrook, Essendon, Essendon North, Essendon West, Kealba, Keilor East, Maribyrnong, Moonee Ponds, Niddrie, St Albans, Sunshine North, and parts of Maidstone and Strathmore.
Industries: light manufacturing, retail and service industries.
State electorates: Maribyrnong includes parts of the Victorian Legislative Assembly electorates of Essendon, Footscray, Niddrie and St Albans.
